name: buzzy
content:
buzzy adjective
(ATMOSPHERE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
exciting, especially because a lot of people are present and a lot of things are happening: There's always a buzzy atmosphere in the restaurant.

buzzy adjective
(SOUND)
making a continuous low sound, like that of a bee (= a yellow and black insect that makes honey and can sting you): Despite the sound check, the sound started off buzzy and hissy. The buzzy engines generate lots of noise and vibration. a buzzy bee
